event.title: This year more than 40 handwritten letters were judged

data.event: This year more than 40 handwritten letters were judged on historical accuracy, letter-writing skills and student research on pioneer life in Babcock Grove (now Lombard).
The awards were given Sunday at Sheldon Peck Homestead in Lombard.

event.title: ticketed hundreds of motorists last month

data.event: Roselle police ticketed hundreds of motorists last month as part of a traffic crackdown partially funded with state grant money.
